attributes.action: I think that driving lessons should be allowed for people 16+
attributes.additional_details: Driving lessons should be able to be taken place at 16 years old and a full should be permitted at 17. I believe the young British people are mature enough to have this responsibility. If the Americans can do it, why can’t we!
attributes.background: There are many families across the uk who have to spend thousands each year on public transport. If it was changed, it could cut down this cost. Personally, i have a single mother who doesn't drive and she has to spend a lot of money to get to work. If i was able to drive i may be able to help her.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557594
